title: Oladex
description: Oladex is a cross-platform mobile app and backend built with React Native, Node.js, and PostgreSQL that lets users manage contacts, record voice notes with real-time transcription, and perform semantic search using pgvector embeddings.

title: Inly @ useinly.com
description: Built a React + Next.js web app with a Supabase backend for AI-powered therapy, featuring daily reflections with guided prompts, weekly personalized insights, and a context management pipeline for natural, engaging user experiences.

title: Mira (MacOS Personal Assistant App)
description: Mira is a Swift-based macOS personal assistant that captures on-screen context with global shortcuts, processes screenshots through a Node.js WebSocket server, and delivers real-time AI assistance with ~300ms response latency. It integrates Whisper.cpp for speech-to-text, Silero for voice activity detection, and supports low-latency audio-to-audio interactions. Mira also features LLM tool-calling, enabling dynamic overlays and context capture to make AI interactions seamless and responsive.
